creditline: The Suzanne S. Roberts Fund for Asian Art
description: one of a pair of cuff bracelets; bracelet has lip around all edges; bracelet has three panels; the panels on each end have two birds with a sphere between them; the panel in the center has five lines of five spheres in relief
object_name: Cuff bracelet, one of a pair
title: Cuff bracelet, one of a pair
